title: Shark Nami Legendary Skin (Splash Art + Model Artwork)

replies.body: Personally I Prefer the Deep Terror (or sea witch) Nami concept as a legendary skin, seems it would be more fitting as a legendary. I want her either to get a dark legendary skin (Deep Terror or Bloodmoon) or a very sparkly 1350 skin (heartseeker). There are so many good concepts, RIOT YOU CANT IGNORE US FOREVER {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

> [{quoted}](name=plant5020,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=56BiXWfg,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-02-20T07:36:06.988+0000)
>
> Personally I Prefer the Deep Terror (or sea witch) Nami concept as a legendary skin, seems it would be more fitting as a legendary. I want her either to get a dark legendary skin (Deep Terror or Bloodmoon) or a very sparkly 1350 skin (heartseeker). There are so many good concepts, RIOT YOU CANT IGNORE US FOREVER {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

If you mean this one, that SCREAMS to be an Ultimate Skin, turning her tail entirely into an octopus would be a waste to be just a legendary, it should be an ultimate




http://orig08.deviantart.net/8bad/f/2014/337/0/a/sea_witch_nami_splash_art_by_shockowaffel-d88fyz0.jpg




http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JaJu93eE6sQ/Utf30maaqaI/AAAAAAAAAw8/MnUcjNWtjSE/s1600/sea+witch+nami.jpg
Ultimate skins are almost always multiple skins in one. This is dunk master tier at best.

I see it being Ultimate.  Legendary only have the new model/voice over/effects/ect... this can clearly have an evolving model like the Ultimates do, like she'd get more and more tentacles and scalier as it evolves.  This is afterall just an idea on it, when Riot however takes some of these art designs to bring to life they improve and add even more to them.

This is a very cool skin!
Wait... Where is Riot KateyKhaos?
My question exactly.
RITO GIVE IT TO ME. NOW. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Nah, we need reverse nami. I mean this is cool, but reverse is way better:

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/7c522f6163d6895e438c51d224a2de86.jpg
Uhhh that's fishy {{champion:105}} {{champion:267}}
Fizz is an axolotl.

Where is Deep Terror Nami?!?!?!?!? 
This is a Nami thread where is he?!!!!!!
https://images.bookish.com/cms/1390923585711-com_.gif
ikr, the thread isn't complete until she arrives
_Waits in ambush for DeepTerrorNami to show up_
"I think that's just a regular bush."
"Healing spell!"

Her W should change colors if it hits an enemy, going from blue to red if it touches an enemy.
Her Ult should have a shark in the middle somewhere.
Her E bubble should be replaced with tiny sharks.
Her recall is her singing like River spirit except it's her humming Jaws.
Her joke should be "Fish are food not friends, including enemies"
Aye but the splash makes her look kinda bulky and chubby around the midsection.

holy crap you mean it doesn't look anorexic?
so terrible
*DERP*
Well she would be based off a shark, and have you seen those things? Bulky and chubby animals.
RIOT PLZ, Legendary Nami skin.
Should change the name to great white nami.

PLEASE YES! PLEASE. I love Nami, but her skins are all "meh" or just "good", none of them are really stand-out. She'd be my favorite support if DJ Sona DIDN'T release. (You can't argue with those dropped beats OR dat ass)
Still waiting for the disco viktor skin lol ... I'm serious :^|

I think this is more appropriate as a 1350 skin since it uses the same model and could get away with simple voice manipulation/vfx changes. 

An appropriate legendary skin would be something that drastically changes the model or concept, such as having a non-water theme or even giving nami legs (I love the sea witch octopus one!)
Still waiting for "Sharko" Skin. You know. Shaco + Shark = Sharko :) {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Nice! All concepts that differ more from Nami's base than her current skins are welcome!
I think her current skins are a bit boring because they are too similar in theme/ style.
Don't care much for the splash but do love the character design.
I would buy a Shark / Deep Terror Nami skin the moment it hit the store. I love her for being cute & cheerful but it'd be great to have a dark skin for those games when I mean business.

I have a 1 skin per champ rule and Gnar is my only exception to that rule, however if this skin came outI would definitely buy it. Nami is my main support (and well, I main support too so I play her the most XD) and I currently have koi and its chroma but this would be such an awesome skin
nami one of my main supports as well (on break from her) i have the urf the NamiTee skin Koi and Lake spirit
Great design.
I would buy this skin in a heartbeat
still waiting for my Davy Jones {{champion:41}}  ultimate skin
.. I really want a Shark Nami skin please ... my wallet is pried open for the taking.
Very nice
_Awesome._
10/10 would f*ck
I'd f*** it.
